text: Sholezard ( /ʃʊllə zærd/) is an Iranian traditional saffron rice pudding dessert. It is traditionally served on the occasion of festivals such as Tirgan, as well as Ramazan. ==Ingredients== Sholezard is made of rice, and is flavored with saffron, sugar, rose water, and cardamom. It is typically decorated with cinnamon, almonds, and pistachios. ==See also== * Rice pudding * Zarda (food) * Zerde ==References== ==External links== Category:Iranian desserts
